Package com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.eval

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Evaluatable
    Evaluatable is the interface objects implement to indicate they can be evaluated with an EvaluationContext and return an EvaluationResult.
    EvaluationContext
    EvaluationContext provides the interface that the PDP uses to evaluate its set of Policies and PolicySets against a Request.
    Matchable
    Matchable is the interface objects implement to indicate they are part of a XACML Target matching tree.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EvaluationContextFactory
    EvaluationContextFactory provides methods for creating EvaluationContext objects based on configuration information found in standard places.
    EvaluationResult
    EvaluationResult extends StdMutableResult with methods useful within a PDP implementation
    MatchResult
    MatchResult is the value returned by the Matchable interface.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MatchResult.MatchCode  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    EvaluationContextException
    EvaluationContextException extends Exception to represent errors thrown by methods in the EvaluationContext and EvaluationContextFactory.
    EvaluationException
    EvaluationException extends Exception to represent errors returned by methods of the Evaluatable interface and the Matchable interface.
